=== About me: ===
------

I'm  Venezuelan friend born in El Tigre Edo Anzo치tegui, I speak Spanish and English I can describe myself as a Geek, Gamer, Otaku, and then a graduate systems engineering in the UNEFA Univerisy, My first encounter with the Gnu / Linux distributions was many years ago in a course developer for IBM Software I was worked with suselinux and then quickly I discovered Ubuntu and it was like love at first sight to find a complete distribution to be stable , quick, beautiful and a great community that represents Venezuela. Naudy was one of the first people I met and thanks to him I could contribute even more to the community by participating in numerous local and regional events as organizer and speaker.
